name: @textbricks/vscode
description: A VSCode extension providing structured templates for multiple languages to develop efficiently

scripts.copy-data: mkdir -p dist/data dist/assets/css dist/assets/js dist/assets/icons && cp -r src/data/* dist/data/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r ../../assets/css/* dist/assets/css/ && cp -r ../../assets/js/* dist/assets/js/ && cp -r ../../assets/icons/* dist/assets/icons/
